Summary: it was a triangle with three brigt white lights on the corners and one red in the middle
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside around 7:30pm getting my backpack from school when i was on the steps going down to the driveway i looked up at the sky and i saw three triangle shaped ufo's zigzagging in all directions they left a white cloud like line and there was two of them so i ran inside and grabed my cell phone then i called my friends and they said they seen it to so it just wasent me it was a mass sighting.
